content: for 20 gram cake will use about 4 gms of yarn co 32 sts divide sts equally onto your needles join in the round being careful not to twist the work if using a 9 circular place beginning of round marker all other styles will know the beginning of the round is the first stitch on the needle to the left of the tail round 1 *k2 p2* to end of round repeat round 1 for 4 10 cm use a tapestry needle to pick up all 32 sts and cinch tightly to close weave in ends and enjoy 3 ball socks©madcow designs
